description: From Latin and New Latin hippopotamus, from Ancient Greek ἱπποπόταμος (hippopótamos), from ἵππος (híppos, “horse”) (English hippo-) + ποταμός (potamós, “river”).

nouns.description: hippopotamus (plural hippopotami or hippopotamuses or hippopotamus)

entries.meaning: A large, semi-aquatic, herbivorous (plant-eating) African mammal (Hippopotamus amphibius; common hippopotamus).
Any similar animal of the family Hippopotamidae.
